messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/4/03 10:33:07 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  Oh Deb, don t
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/4/03 10:33:07 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Not a moderator, just obnoxious. < >>

Oh Deb, don't you ever call yourself obnoxious. Your posts have done more
good and helped all of us in so many ways.
Don't ever dis yourself, your voice is beautiful!

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
